content: lion brand pattern # 20329 corrections applied *cgs-openworkscarf pdf* skill level easy glitterspun® article #990 *discontinued* 345 yards crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm gauge first row + 11 row = 5 inches 12 7 cm in pattern worked in 2-row pattern to desired length lion brand yarns requires free registration and log-in to access patterns they are written in u s crochet terminology
